## Overview

This repository tracks the R codes and Quarto document to generate a questionnaire report as part of the small-grant project "Increasing Impact for Enggano" funded by the Impact Division, University of Oxford. It is a follow-up of our [Enggano](https://enggano.ling-phil.ox.ac.uk/) research.

Project Members: Mary Dalrymple, I Wayan Arka, Charlotte Hemmings, Gede Primahadi Wijaya Rajeg, Dendi Wijaya, Engga Zakaria Sangian.

## How to cite this repository
